8 #include <webots/utils/AnsiCodes.hpp>

10 namespace twizy_webots {
11 
12 Motors::Motors(webots::Supervisor &supervisor, ros::NodeHandle &nh)
13  : left_steering_motor_(supervisor.getMotor("front_left_steering_motor")),
14  right_steering_motor_(supervisor.getMotor("front_right_steering_motor")),
15  left_drive_motor_(supervisor.getMotor("rear_left_wheel_motor")),
16  right_drive_motor_(supervisor.getMotor("rear_right_wheel_motor")) {
17 
18  if (!nh.getParam("physical/rear_wheel/radius", rear_wheel_radius_) ||
19  !nh.getParam("physical/max_forward_speed", max_forward_speed_) ||
20  !nh.getParam("physical/max_reverse_speed", max_reverse_speed_) ||
21  !nh.getParam("physical/max_steering_angle", max_steering_angle_) ||
22  !nh.getParam("physical/wheelbase", wheelbase_) ||
23  !nh.getParam("physical/front_track", front_track_) ||
24  !nh.getParam("physical/rear_track", rear_track_)) {
25  std::cout << webots::AnsiCodes::RED_FOREGROUND
26  << "Required ROS parameters missing"
27  << webots::AnsiCodes::RESET << std::endl;
28  return;
29  }
30 
31  std::cout << "Initializing motors\n";
32 
33  left_drive_motor_->setPosition(std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity());
34  right_drive_motor_->setPosition(std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity());
35  left_drive_motor_->setVelocity(0.0);
36  right_drive_motor_->setVelocity(0.0);
37 
38  std::cout << "Subscribing to ackermann_cmd\n";
39 
40  subscriber_ = nh.subscribe("ackermann_cmd", 10, &Motors::callback, this);
41 }
42 
43 void Motors::callback(
44  const ackermann_msgs::AckermannDriveStamped::ConstPtr &msg) {
45 
46  double steering_angle = std::max(
47  std::min((double)msg->drive.steering_angle, max_steering_angle_),
48  -max_steering_angle_);
49  double angular_velocity =
50  std::max(std::min((double)msg->drive.speed, max_forward_speed_),
51  -max_reverse_speed_) /
52  rear_wheel_radius_;
53 
54  printf("Speed: %3.3f m/s, Steering angle: %3.3f°\n", msg->drive.speed,
55  steering_angle * 180 / M_PI);
56 
57  if (abs(steering_angle) > 1e-10) {
58  double turning_radius = wheelbase_ / tan(steering_angle);
59  left_steering_motor_->setPosition(
60  atan(wheelbase_ / (turning_radius - front_track_ / 2.0)));
61  right_steering_motor_->setPosition(
62  atan(wheelbase_ / (turning_radius + front_track_ / 2.0)));
63  left_drive_motor_->setVelocity(angular_velocity *
64  (turning_radius - rear_track_ / 2.0) /
65  turning_radius);
66  right_drive_motor_->setVelocity(angular_velocity *
67  (turning_radius + front_track_ / 2.0) /
68  turning_radius);
69  } else {
70  left_steering_motor_->setPosition(0.0);
71  right_steering_motor_->setPosition(0.0);
72  left_drive_motor_->setVelocity(angular_velocity);
73  right_drive_motor_->setVelocity(angular_velocity);
74  }
75 }
76 
77 Motors::~Motors() {
78  left_steering_motor_.reset();
79  right_steering_motor_.reset();
80  left_drive_motor_.reset();
81  right_drive_motor_.reset();
82 }
83 
84 } // namespace twizy_webots
